kinenergy.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 
00002 
00003 !  ===================================================================
00004 !
00005 !                              KINENERGY
00006 !
00007 !   Calculate kinetic energy
00008 !
00009 !  ===================================================================
00010 
00011 subroutine kinenergy(ekine,ekini,ebeam)
00012   use physvars
00013   use treevars
00014 
00015   implicit none
00016   include 'mpif.h'
00017 
00018   integer :: p,i,ierr
00019   real*8 :: ekine, ekini, ebeam, sum_plas_e, sum_plas_i, sum_beam, gamma
00020   real*8, dimension(nppm) :: uhx, uhy, uhz
00021 
00022   sum_plas_e = 0.
00023   sum_plas_i = 0.
00024 
00025   sum_beam = 0.
00026 
00027 
00028   do p=1, npp
00029   ! Velocities at previous 1/2-step to synch with P.E.
00030     uhx(p) = ux(p)-dt*q(p)*Ex(p)/m(p)/2. 
00031     uhy(p) = uy(p)-dt*q(p)*Ey(p)/m(p)/2.
00032     uhz(p) = uz(p)-dt*q(p)*Ez(p)/m(p)/2.
00033     gamma = sqrt(1.0 + uhx(p)**2 + uhy(p)**2 + uhz(p)**2)
00034     if (pelabel(p) <= ne) then
00035      !  Sum local plasma electron kinetic energy
00036       sum_plas_e = sum_plas_e + m(p)*(gamma - 1.0)
00037 
00038     else if (pelabel(p) <=ne+ni) then
00039       sum_plas_i = sum_plas_i + m(p)*(gamma - 1.0)
00040 
00041        else
00042      !  Sum beam energy
00043       sum_beam = sum_beam + m(p)*(gamma - 1.0)
00044     endif
00045  end do
00046 
00047 ! Gather partial sums together for global energies
00048  
00049   call MPI_ALLREDUCE(sum_plas_e, ekine, 1, MPI_REAL8, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr)
00050   call MPI_ALLREDUCE(sum_plas_i, ekini, 1, MPI_REAL8, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr)
00051   call MPI_ALLREDUCE(sum_beam, ebeam, 1, MPI_REAL8, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr)
00052 
00053 
00054 end subroutine kinenergy
00055
